properties.description: Our Cafe/Bar and lounge is open to anyone with chronic, life-limiting illness/their carers, older people, and people with disabilities. A selection of games and books will be available for use, and we're hoping to screen movies on a few selected dates. Free refreshments and a hot lunch will be served to guests. Please contact us in advance to confirm your space, to allow for adequate catering arrangements.
properties.name: Plan Antaron

properties.address:
Eco Hub Aber,
The Arcade, Bath St, Aberystwyth,
SY23 2DN
properties.description: We are a local independent space offering desks and wifi, suitable for keeping warm and getting on-line for social media and e-mails. It is a beautiful natural space with plants and a sea view, with ground level disabled access. Our space is designed to raise awareness for people to reduce carbon and increase biodiversity and encourage environmental conversation to reduce climate anxiety. There will be in real life board games too.
properties.name: Eco Hub Aber

properties.address: Bronant Vestry SY23 4TG
properties.description: An opportunity to socialise, to learn more about the history of our village, and possibly to play board games or do some craft work; an opportunity also for learners to practice their Welsh. But, most importantly, to enjoy each other’s company.
